title: Farscape.1999-2003.&.The.Peacekeeper.Wars.2004 Complete Set
description:
FARSCAPE (1999-2003) & THE PEACEKEEPER WARS (2004) - COMPLETE SET

These are DVDRips/BRrips of Farscape (TV Series) and
The Peacekeeper Wars (TV Movie). All the Bluray Extras from TSV's
Complete Series Torrent are included. File names ending with '+ C' 
denote optional commentaries.

Also included in this set are all the Farscape Comics (2002-
2011) and Farscape: The Game (PC, 2002). 

Q: Comics in digital form? How do I read them?

A: Comic book archives are just series of image files
   of pages stored in a single archive. There are several 
   good free Comic reader programmes available, personally 
   I use CDisplay and Honeyview. Comic archives can also be
   extracted to a series of image files /w Winrar, 
   Winzip or similar archivers/compressors.

****************************************************************

*** FARSCAPE (1999-2003) & THE PEACEKEEPER WARS (2004) ***

Astronaut John Crichton, on an experimental space mission, is 
accidentally hurled across the universe into the midst of an 
intergalactic conflict. Trapped among alien creatures wielding 
deadly technology and hunted by a merciless military race, 
Crichton is on an epic odyssey more spectacular than anything 
he has ever imagined.
